Ingredients.1: 2  prepared 8 inch pastry shells, baked and cooled

Ingredients.4: 1 (10 ounce) jar maraschino cherries, drained and chopped (Optional)

Ingredients.7: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen whipped topping, thawed

Directions.1: In a large bowl, combine lemon juice, pecans, cherries, condensed milk, and pineapple. Mix well, then gently fold in whipped topping until all ingredients are thoroughly combined.

Directions.2: Pour mixture into pie shells. Chill before serving. Garnish with chopped cherries and pecans if desired.
